summary:
Grand Theft Auto is an exciting video game series where players explore open worlds, complete missions, and enjoy driving and shooting. Created in 1997, it's known for its fun gameplay and fictional cities based on real places. The games let you play as different criminals trying to succeed in a dangerous world.

With famous voices and cool graphics, GTA has become super popular, selling millions of copies. It's even been called a British design icon! But some people don't like the violent parts.
title: Grand Theft Auto
